summary: Mobile app with home page featuring clickable banners, navigation buttons (back/home) on all pages, and visual pricing plans interface with static PIX QR code payment
architectural_notes: Static PIX QR code generated from email key: proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com
Payment verification must be done manually - no automatic transaction processing
Navigation pattern: back/home buttons present on all pages for quick exit
known_issues: Push notifications not supported by platform - cannot implement 70-second payment reminder alerts
No real payment processing - PIX payments must be verified manually
No dynamic QR code generation - using static QR code only
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Static PIX QR code for email key proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com (pix-qr-code.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a pricing plans page displaying subscription tiers (Basic, Premium, etc.) with visual cards showing price, benefits, and feature lists for each plan
Generate a static PIX QR code image using the email key 'proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com' and display it prominently on the pricing plans page
Add payment instructions section explaining how to complete PIX payment using the QR code, including steps for scanning and confirming the transaction

new_feature_requests.summary: Add back/home navigation buttons on all pages
Create home page with intuitive clickable banners
Create visual pricing plans interface with cards showing different tiers
Implement static PIX QR code with email key proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com
